General.Name: The Thai Setakij Insurance Public Company Limited
General.Description: The Thai Setakij Insurance Public Company Limited engages in the non-life insurance business in Thailand. It provides car, accident, travel, home and condo, fire, disaster, miscellaneous, marine, and freight insurance products. The company was incorporated in 1942 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
General.Address: No. 87 , M. Thai Tower, Bangkok, Thailand, 10330
